Photo list: show user rank in photo category
Photo card: resize photo image width to
Photo card: resize photo image height to
Delay after the last comment before member can leave a new one
The highest accessible positive mark even if a voting member's own rank in photo category is higher (cutting the highest mark if rank is too hight)
The highest accessible positive mark even if a voting member's own rank in photo category is lower (adding an extra positive balls to the highest mark if rank is too low)
The lowest accessible negative mark even if a voting member's own rank in photo category is lower (adding an extra negative balls to the lowest mark if rank is too low)
The lowest accessible negative mark even if a voting member's own rank in photo category is higher (cutting the lowest mark if rank is too hight)

translation.ru: Количество единовременно доступных категорий для оценки работы
